Title: Sharp Panda APT IOC
Description: Sharp Panda, a China based Nation State APT group is in surge for its attack campaign. The threat group has been updating its toolset and techniques lately. The attack operators reportedly use spearphishing tactics to gain initial access. It further utilizes old Microsoft Office vulnerabilities together with the chain of in-memory loaders to attempt and deploy a previously unknown backdoor on targeted system.
